current_task: CLAUDE.md documentation complete, ready for Phase 2
completed: GitHub SSH access configured for Claude 2 (port 443)
message: Acknowledged MusicBrainz status! Recording Solr collection corrupted at upstream (metabrainz.org) - not your fault. 14/15 collections is excellent for our use case since artist relationships come from PostgreSQL anyway. Ready to proceed with Phase 2 (Cloudflare Tunnel) whenever you are. The recording workaround via PostgreSQL direct queries is fine for InterChord.

decisions: Recording Solr issue is upstream - use PostgreSQL workaround
14/15 Solr collections sufficient for InterChord launch
Ready to proceed with Phase 2 (Cloudflare Tunnel)
warnings: Use PostgreSQL direct queries for track lookups
